NAME: Kabir Sarkar
ABOUT:
BACKGROUND: I have always been a coder and tech enthusiast since school. Although I didn't have much exposure in my initial years I had realised writing down logic into a coding language comes naturally to me. My prima forte has always been Java, apart from which I am also quite adept at Unix Shell Script, Javascript, JSP and SQL. 

EXPERIENCE: I have had industry experience with three businesses till now, which belong to Banking and Finance, Supply Chain Management and Credit Management domains respectively. Apart from industry, I have also taken up non-profit projects like designing Library Application prototype and Online Desktop App based Coding Competition during Tech Fest.

SKILLS: My nature of work have always been towards finding smart solutions and reducing effort, hence increasing productivity. My ability to observe repetitive tasks and automate them and securing all possible vulnerabilities with any tool or technology at hand has allowed me to get familiar with loads of APIs/tools like Selenium, PL/SQL, Apache POI, Apache Tika, Swing API, JQuery, Maven, JDBC, Sterling NDM, Struts2, Spring, Hibernate, ESAPI, Burp Suite, JProfiler.

STRENGTHS: Ability to quickly learn new technology, Observe repetitive tasks and reduce effort by automation, Work under stressful deadlines, Communication (not just speaking good english)

PURPOSE: I constantly seek to enhance my knowledge by taking up new challenges and successfully overcoming them.
